package.description: clean the interface from xvm things to make space for Battle_Observer

package.name: use the same Clan Icons that were last installed
package.description: To save time with your installation of clan icons, you could check this option to recycle/move the last installed icons to the new installation.

package.name: 6th sense - Icon Duration
package.description: Configure how long the 6th sense icon stays on your screen.\nIf you later select 6th sense settings in the 6th sense tab, this is automaticaly turned off.

package.name: Information Label for Missions (Mission Tracker)
package.description:
This label positioned under the left PlayersPanel shows you many informations you need for missions or for your daily games too. 
Examples for that are your damage, damage of your platoon members, damage of you and your platoon members together, number of enemys you spotted, number of critical hits you made, number of enemys your complete platoon killed, damage through reconnaissance and chain destruction, damage through spotting only, damage through chain destruction only, damage you got, hits you got and damage you blocked. 

Information Label for Missions by MarsOne: http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/340002-09151-omc-modpack-installer-mit-bild-video-vorschau-letztes-update-siehe-wwwodemmortiscom/page__st__4980__pid__13912513#entry13912513

package.description:
Like the penatration indicator, this mod shows if you have a chance to penetrate the enemy.

format:

colors:
green = chance to pierce
red = no chance to pierce

package.name: HARDscope by Andrey-Hard and KobkaG
package.description:
- Sights contain 14 historical sighting grids of the USSR, Germany, the United States and one grid of France
- The choice of sighting grids is carried out through the game menu in combat.
- The blackout is embedded in the sniper scope and its transparency is adjusted through the settings menu
- The sight contains information: 
- Digital Rangefinder (Distance to Target)
- Timer and Recharge Time
- Strength indicator in% (CP)
- Indicator of ammunition
- Animation of the projectile during recharging.

package.description:
Left shield - nationality: 
Yellow - UK; Light Green - USA; Red - USSR; Gray - Germany; Blue - France; Green - China; White - Japan; Navy blue - Czechoslovakia; Teal - Sweden 
Icon Color - type of tank: Bronze - Heavy Tank; Green - Medium Tank; Light bronze - Light Tank; Red - SPG; Blue - Tank Destroyer 
Right numbers - Armor points(Front/Side/Back) 
Yellow Star - Premium indicator

Legal Info from WG employe Dance210:
Hey Silvers_,

We are currently working on the creation of a process that will more formally vet mods.

In the meantime, I do not personally feel that the mod you are asking about specifically violates the guidelines listed in the fair play policy. That said, those could change in the future and we do not recommend the use of any third-party mods, especially ones that may eventually be determined to provide an unfair information advantage.

package.name: Autoaim Indicator Extended v{version}
package.description:
Using auto-aiming is very useful, especially when you start someone to twist or just the target stands and does not move. Grabbing it you no longer need to drive with your mouse and try to aim your gun at it. The majority of tankmen learned about this miracle of the invention after the introduction of the regime of tank racing. 

Often, in serious mixes, taking someone on an auto-target, you can forget whom you are keeping on the fly and this often does not have a very good effect on your effectiveness, because you can not shoot where you want to. In order to always be aware of what kind of goal is captured in your sight, there is a Mod: Indicator - an extended indication of this Mod. With his help, not to see the captured goal will be simply impossible.

By setting the mode of the extended auto-target display, you will see the following alerts on the captured target:
- on the captured tank will be included a constant stroke of the contour
- around will appear a semitransparent energy field
- if the target you capture suddenly leaves your field of vision, the arrow on the right or left will show directions and distance to it

The color of the energy field indicator changes in the mod settings in the hangar. Available colors are shown in the row below. 

Color options:
- blue
- brown
- chocolate
- cornflower blue
- cream
- blue cyan
- emerald
- golden
- green
- yellow-green
- hot pink
- lime
- orange
- pink
- purple
- red
- WG Backlight
- WG enemy
- WG friendly
- WG platoon
- yellow

package.name: SafeShot by OldSkool
package.description: SafeShot is preventing team damage to allied tanks. This mod offers you a nice interface and the option to configure it ingame.

package.name: SafeShot by PROTanki
package.description: The SafeShot mod is the disabling of accidental firing on corpses and allies for World of Tanks 1.0.1.1. A very useful mod that will save you from firing on already killed tanks. Example, you shoot the enemy is not one and finish it off, but you already poke without stopping the button and shoot into the already killed tank and leave not the CD. With this mod, this will not happen again. Also, the mod will help protect your account from your children or those who do not know people who can start shooting at their allies.

package.name: MeltyElement EffectiveArmorPanel (by elementofprgress)
package.description:
The effective armor calculator does, well exactly what it sounds like it does. 
It gives you real time information about the actual thickness of your hulls armor based on angle of your tank compared to where you are looking/aiming.

It´s a remake of the ArmorPanel (& Protractor) that was included in the original MeltyMap sights. 
This mod shows front and side armor in current line of view (side armor without trucks).
(as i got asked: you DO NOT see the lines on the picture)

Attention! This mod was released by its developer as ALPHA!

package.description:
Mod is made to help people with color blindness. The line, that indicates the border of maps, is expanded to the edges of the map. Now don't notice her is almost impossible. "Full" and "Light" differ only in the degree of compressibility. 
WIDE - the border of maps is expanded to the edges of the map.
INTENSIVE - the border of maps is made in the thickness of 20 pixels (on the standard = 1 pixel).
GRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 10x10.
EXTRAGRID - into the version "INTENSIVE" added the grid lines 50x50.
COMMAND - into the version "GRID" added the big numbering squares card.
SPG - into the version "GRID" added the small numbering squares card.

package.name: Gold Visibility Mod by lgfrbcsgo
package.updateComment:
added 2. URL (german) http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/672149-

Version 2.0.11 (Repackaged for WoT 1.0.2.4): 
Some files of the mod are automatically generated based on game files by a build script. 
Although the code of the mod has not changed, some files which are generated automatically might have. That's the reason why the version receives a bump with every WoT update.
package.description:
Features
- Changes the color of hit effects
- Multiple colors choices available
- Works for all tanks in both teams
- Recolors penetrating hits, bouncing shots, ricochets, shots hitting the ground or other objects
- Does NOT recolor none penetrating hits or shots into water

This mod adds a short sparkling effect to penetrating APCR/HEAT hits. Not only will you be able to tell if an enemy tank is shooting gold rounds at your allied tanks (or at you), but also if one of your allies is a gold spammer. This information will help you determining whether to engage or not to engage an enemy.

FAQ
Q: The Mod isn't working.
A: Make sure Extra Effects are enabled in the settings under Graphics.

package.description: Hawg’s -Spg - TD - Passive Scout -Tactical Minimap’s “. Some of the top WOT Clans DONT want you to see or have this .Most good players use the minimap as a major tool in battle . So I took from these web sites “Maps Tactics” & “Guru maps” and other Discrete web sites. They show the best place to set up in Arty & Td . I mark the spots on the minimap where Arty & Td is Most Likely to set up. It shows the best strategic place for arty & td to set up ,This mod will show In Battle,So you don’t have to try to remember where to go. You can use this for “Counter Battery” or You can set up your Arty or TD in these spots. The arty icons are not to bold, just enough to see them on the minimap. This mod is great for Clan Wars !

package.name: Hangar Manager (HangMan) v{version}
package.updateComment:
Version 2.26.2:
- added preview-pictures for new hangars in 1.0.2.4
- fixed issue where camera moved to max. distance after returning from customization-room

Version 2.26.1:
- bug-fix: when showing a tank in vehicle-preview, the camouflage from selected tank in garage was displayed on this tank

Version 2.26:
- improved 'move hangar-vehicle window":
	- accessible via middle-mousebutton-click on HangMan-button and/or added "move"-button in main HangMan-window
	- textfields for coordinates etc. are editable now
	- added buttons to reset values, save hangar and cancel process
- language-files are no longer created on runtime, all (?) available languages included (moved to separate folder, proper translations still welcome)
- some bug-fixes
Updating config (at least language-folder) is needed.

Update 2.25:

- adapted for 1.0.2
- added option to remove the 'please-buy-me-tank' in hangar
- fixed not working 'nation'-mode
- added some more hangars; config changed so 'nation'-mode makes more sense now
- removed Buffon from non-event-hangars (sorry Gianluigi, I like you anyway)
- moved text in 'move-hangar-vehicle'-mode into new draggable window
- some localisations are made during runtime by 'https://tech.yandex.com/translate/', might contain errors
- code-redesign
Please delete/update your existing config.

Update 2.24.2:
- fixed a bug which could prevent a proper start into battle (under certain circumstances)

V2.24: FIXES removing GUI on camera-movements & not-visible cap-circles under certain circumstances
- added: change vehicle-position and -orientation in hangar by pressing LALT + F12, changeable in settings-window and save this as new hangar.

2018-04-08: cap circles will be shown in any case (deactivated experimental HangMan function)
Version 2.21.1:
- regained camouflage-functionality (no winter-camo in desert-hangars etc.)
package.description:
Hello friends!

I want you to meet my HangarManager "HangMan".


Features:

Creating your own hangar during a battle by saving the map and tank position
Possibility to make separate sound settings for each hangar
Change the hangar by:
selector-window or by pressing keys on keyboard 
random (on login and after battle)
depending on nation of selected vehicle
last known position on map of last battle 
Automatic reading of all installed hangars (with exclusion list)
settings-window for keyboard-settings
preview-images installabe (new since 2.2)

package.name: Camouflages Selector by Polyacov_Yury
package.updateComment:
2. devURL: https://koreanrandom.com/forum/topic/35250-

02-05/05/2018 (WoT 1.0.1)
 The mod added inscriptions, posters and effects.
 Normally sorted items in the carousel. 

04-Mar-03.2018
Edit under 1.0.0.
03/07/2018

Fixed the application of camouflage on cars, in which the tower is technically absent, but in fact - no.
2.0.0 (02.02.2018 - 27.02.2017)

Version number is pushed to 2.0. Because, well, you see, the previous jump from 0.9.0 to 2.0.0 was not very justified.
All is rewritten. percent on 99. Only a couple of minor functions in ConfigInterface remained unchanged.
Logic is adjusted to a new system of customization.
Now, to configure and install camouflage used an external view from the VG. It is called - as in the previous version, via the button in ModsListAPI.
The "hot key" is removed. To install a randomly selected randomly selected camouflage, open the Camouflage Settings menu - randomly installed camouflage will be displayed as changes made by the player, which, if that, can also be edited before use.
The logic of random selection of camouflage was revised. Now most of the operations for their selection are made at the beginning of the battle, and not when the technique appears in the light.
Added a tick in the settings - "Fill in empty spaces". If it costs and the machine is not painted completely - KamoSelector specially for you will decorate it. If the tick is not necessary - KamoSelector will process only those cars on which there is no camouflage at all.
Added a tick in the settings - "One camouflage for the whole tank." If it costs - KamoSelector will try to choose the same coloring for all parts of the car. If not, or such selection is impossible (on two elements of the armor are different camouflage) - for each empty seat will be matched its casual camouflage. The previous tick also affects the operation of this part of the logic - if there is any coloring on the machine - it will be excluded from the processing by the random selection module of camouflage.
The old camouflagesCache.json and settings.json files are NOT compatible with the new version of the mod. The first will have to be removed, the second one can be overwritten by the fact that it comes with the mod.
Alas, now camouflage has no names. Only numeric identifiers. This does not apply to fashion-added camouflage - in fact, their configs are supported without editing. But the mandatory fields are now 3 pieces for camouflage instead of the horror that was going on there.
"Overwriters," who were devilish devils, renamed "Command camouflage." Now everything fell into place.
Types are renamed to the seasons.
Modified camouflage have been renamed into their own.
Removed restrictions on the change of seasons and modes of random selection of camouflage. If you want a tank in a deserted camouflage ride on a winter map, it's up to you.
10/28/2017

The analytics now shows the date of the compilation of the mod.
Turn off the repainting of Frankie and Stein.
10/09/2017

Edit under the general test (correctly catch Exception when reading the config).
Fixed a rare crash during combat loading.
2.5.6 (14/09/2017)

Added a check mark in the settings for disabling processing machines that have camouflage in the kit.
Added a tick in the settings, which turns all the modified camouflage into "skins without dirt" on all tanks.
2.5.5 (13.09.2017)

Fixed the disappearance of marks on guns and other elements of customization of tanks.
11/09/2017

Now the camouflage setting through the button in the setup menu sets this camouflage immediately. Before that, I had to re-enter the Hangar.
09/09/2017

The processing of premium tanks with camouflage in the kit is disabled.
Now there is no need to monitor the uniqueness of the identifiers of modified camouflage. It is enough that they are unique within a single file.
Fixed a difficult bug in the Angara, connected with the inability to "buy" camouflage on a tank, which is not processed by the mod because it was included in the disable section.
2.5.4 (08.28.2017)

Edits at 9.20.
Modified camouflage have moved along the new "old" path - mods / configs / PYmods / CamoSelector / camouflages / camo_name. Now you do not need a .wotmod package for every camouflage. The archives in the header are updated.
03/05/2017

Fixed the configuration settings and the processing of international camouflage.
Fixed a bug in removal of CamoSelector camouflages selected through the customization window.
Fixed the processing of the type of camouflage in the hangar.
2.5.2 (02.03.2017)

Numerous small logic fixes associated with the transition to 9.17.1 and
Moving to the .wotmod-package.
2.5.0 (16.12.2016)

International camouflage is placed in a separate "subgroup".
Now you can switch between nations by selecting a tank in the carousel without fear of losing all the changes made. The nation in the settings switches automatically.
The menu remembers the last selected camouflage for each nation within one session (when the client is restarted, the numbers of the camouflages selected in the menu will be reset).
Related minor edits of the logic of fashion.
2.4.0 (13.12.2016)

The concept of over-riding is brought to mind.
Go to modsCore 2.0.
Now the flash drive displays only the nation of the selected tank. Also, the choice of camouflage automatically previews it on the current tank, and the button with the tank is equivalent to pressing Ctrl + F5. Well, the button "Apply" is renamed "Save".
2.2.0 (25.11.2016)

Added the promised customization of standard camouflage.
2.0.0 (11/09/2016)

The way it's meant to be made.
0.9.0 (12/10/2016)

Beta release.
package.description:
Installer of their own and / or casual camouflage aka CamoSelector

Modification allows you to create your own camouflage for tanks.
Also there is a functional for free installation of existing patterns in the game on any tank.
In the mod fully functional mode WoTRC authored by tratatank.
Mod allows not only to distribute all random camouflage (or all the same, or one allies, other enemies, or ...), but also allows them to completely turn them off.
You can also selectively disable only purchased camouflage (if you need to strictly color the tanks of allies and enemies, for example, a useful feature when using WGL camouflage, which are also included in the mod.)

package.name: Battle Fiat 126 P
package.description:
The “Battle Fiat” will replace the TKS-20 with the good old Polish Fiat 126P - the car that motorized Poland! 
The only differences are that it doesn’t have wheels… it has tracks instead :P It also has a gun…

Known issues:
-The model might not be shaded properly on some computer, I don’t know why yet
-GUI Icons extra will decrease the quality of some GUI elements.

package.name: KV-2-2-2 - The tower of Stalin!
package.updateComment:
NO conflict with gunsounds: WWIIHWA by Kriegstreiber, Budyx69 OR by Ed76na+Apa6ecka

conflict with gunsounds: It will crash to desktop, take one of the above one
 by Shimada Samas OR GnomeFather’s (reworked by Zorgane)
package.description:
This mod will replace the turret model of both KV-2 and KV-2 (R) - gives them 2 more turrets!
And we got the KV-2-2-2 a monster with 3 guns.

The other 2 guns are sadly locked to the turret - they will only rotate with the turret and never look up/down. Always only forward. 

However, all 3 guns will produce the shooting particles and SOUNDS!
 Yes, it will actually sound like 3 guns firing :)

Known issues: 
-Paint is not displayed properly on the turret if both paint and a transparent camouflage are applied.

https://wgmods.net/modmakers/140632/
modder: KptKosmiT91 (thx)
